commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Now it's time for our final showdown, which will decide the victor of the sports battle!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um... I want to check on something.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What's up?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Right now, Eli and Rin are in the lead with six wins each, while Mari and Setsuna have five, Hanamaru has four, and I have three.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What happens if someone besides Eli or Rin wins this next competition?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: O-Oh yeah, zura. If Mari or Setsuna wins, they'll be tied with Eli and Rin. If you or I win, we still can't win the championship, zura!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: In that case... How about we do this? Whoever wins the next round gets four wins added to their total. That means you guys could pull off a comeback and grab victory.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Nice idea! You're so smart, Eli. Let's go with that special rule for this last battle!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I could win! I'll do my best! Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yay! I have some hope now, zura!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: If four wins are on the line, no one will end up tied for first... So this next one will truly decide victory!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: And? And?! What're we playing for our final round?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The final battle shall be...a pocketbike race!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Is everyone ready?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That was my first time on a bull, and now it's my first time on a motorbike, zura.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's so tiny and cute!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It really is. Once I got on it, it was even smaller than I thought it would be.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: This'll be good practice for riding a bigger motorcycle someday!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The rules for pocketbike racing are simple. You go for three loops around the course, and whoever crosses the finish line first wins this game and our championship.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Whatever happens, this is it... Let the final battle begin!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's go!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Whoa! Eli took off with a burst of speed!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: She's trying to make a run for it!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: This last round is the most important one. Since it's the final match, anything could happen.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Anything could happen, so I'm going to win this thing before anything does! A pocketbike race makes that possible! I think my strategy's allowed, isn't it?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Sorry, everyone. First place... The championship...belongs to me!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Nooo! I'm not gonna lose! Wait up, Eliiii!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I want a comeback victory and the special prize too, zura! Oh no! Whoa!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh! H-Hanamaru, you're wobbling so much... Are you all right?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'm fine, zura! When I was little, people complimented my tricycle riding skills!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: This isn't a tricycle, though! And you're about to go off the track!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: In P.E., we learned that if you want to pass, you should run close to the interior of the track--AHHHHHHH!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yikes! Hold on a minute! Don't come over hereeeee!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh my. Those two went off track all entangled together... Take as much time as you need coming back now, ya hear!
